mapper.update: update t_qiandao set utime = #{now()} where uid = #{uid}
update t_qiandao set continueSign = #{continueSign} ,count = count + 1,utime = now() where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT u.`nickname`,s.`utime` signTime,s.`count`,s.`continueSign` FROM t_qiandao s INNER JOIN user u ON u.`uid` = s.`uid` where s.`uid` = #{uid}
